full_text: I will work with any member of Congress on this that addresses ALL of the four pillars and our team stands ready to provide technical assistance to anyone on the Hill who needs it.

This Administration will not support any deal that doesn't include the framework or fails to include the recommendations made by frontline operators on the authorities and tools they need to do the job Americans have asked them to do.
The proposal from Senators @ChuckGrassley , @JohnCornyn, et al would meet these four pillars and deserves the support of those who are serious about securing our borders and solving #DACA.

Under @POTUS leadership we are looking for a proposal that addresses the compromise WH framework that secures the border, ends chain migration, ends the visa lottery, and provides a permanent solution for #DACA.

Praying for everyone affected by yesterday’s tragic shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School. Thank you to our brave first responders & law enforcement officials for putting your lives on the line to keep us safe. @DHSgov will assist state & local officials any way we can
Our thoughts and prayers are with the victims and their families. @DHSgov is standing by to support our federal and local law enforcement partners. @FLGovScott

full_text: Ready to talk with lawmakers again this week on shutdown and immigration.  Still need a deal for Border Security and DACA. Let's pay our troops and DHS personnel first. We have time to negotiate on DACA but must get it done. #endtheshutdown

Benefits for millions of illegal immigrants instead of paying Americans who put their lives at risk daily to protect ours? I don’t think so. Most Americans don't either. Fund the government and then negotiate. #endtheshutdown

Thank you @TSA for keeping air travel safe throughout the shutdown. Was great to speak w some of the team at @Reagan_Airport this morning. Congress needs to act now to make sure the military, Border Patrol, TSA and all our frontline officers get paid! #governmentshutdown https://t.co/X9jYoJeYUY
The DACA deadline is March 5. Border Patrol and @ICEgov agents are protecting our border today. Let’s pay them now! Fund the government then negotiate. #ClosetheLoopholes

Thank you to all those @DHSgov continuing to keep our nation secure despite the lack of funding. Your dedication is appreciated. Hopefully Congress will pass a bill soon that funds our personnel. Next give us the tools we need to secure the border #WallsWork #ClosetheLoopholes

full_text: But they should know this: Americans will not be coerced by terrorism, and we will not  allow it to become the new normal.  We will fight back aggressively and bring terrorists to justice.

We urge the public to remain vigilant & report any suspicious activity. The administration continues to adopt significant security measures to keep terrorists from entering our country and from recruiting within our borders. The enemy we face is persistent & adaptive.

DHS is taking appropriate action to protect our people & our country in the wake of today’s attempted terrorist attack in NYC. We will continue to assist New York authorities with the response & investigation. 1/2 https://t.co/MLQVbl8JFg
